summary: This documentary on rock 'n' roll groupies, including the infamous Plaster Casters, features performances (musical) by such bands as Ten Years After, Terry Reid, Spooky Tooth, and Cat Mother.
cast: Patty Cakes|Chaz|Joe Cocker|Pamela Des Barres|Andrea Feldman|Goldie Glitters|Miss Harlow|Katy|Alvin Lee|Lixie|Cynthia Plaster Caster|Terry Reid|Peter Shelly|Spooky Tooth|Keith Webb|Ten Years After
title: Groupies
